ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] just joined
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been considering SWG, but I think I will pass. It looks REALLY cool, but I just can t imagine an EQ style combat system or a deriviative thereof working
ygData.messageBody:
I've been considering SWG, but I think I will pass. It looks REALLY cool,
but I just can't imagine an EQ style combat system or a deriviative thereof
working in something that should have some first person shooter aspects to
it. I'm not saying it should be entirely an FPS, but then again, I despised
the combat system in Anarchy Online which I believe is similar to how SWG
will handle it.

For me Planetside is the one I am waiting to checkout. A MMOG that is a FPS!
Sweeet!

-Oskar

----- Original Message -----
From: "Stuart Thomson" <Stuart@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 19, 2003 4:54 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] just joined
